At SmartBear, we deliver the complete visibility developers need to make each release better than the last. Our award winning and industry favorite toolsTestComplete, Swagger, Cucumber, ReadyAPI, Zephyrare trusted by over 16 million developers, testers, and software engineers at 32,000+ organizations – including world-renowned innovators like Adobe, JetBlue, FedEx, and Microsoft.  Backend Engineer- ReadyAPI Work on tangible industry leading products development that hundreds of thousands of software developers worldwide use daily.
Gaining exposure to cutting-edge development technology.
Tech stack: Java 17/11, HTTP, REST API, Maven, Git, Docker, GitHub
The successful candidate will work from our Bangalore office in hybrid modelProduct intro ReadyAPI allows teams to create, manage, and execute automated functional, security, and performance tests in one centralized interface. With ReadyAPI development teams around the world (e.g. NASA, FedEx, ...) can test API types like REST, SOAP, Apache Kafka, MQTT. Record live API traffic, or virtualizing web services to remove pipeline dependencies. Finally integrates with GIT, JIRA, Slack, Jenkins and many more development tools. Go to our product page if you want to know more about ReadyAPI You can even have a free trial to check it out 😊  About the role As a Backend Engineer, you will be working with internal teams around the globe to build one of the world’s best solutions for API testing. You can look forward to working with our best and brightest engineers, product managers, and UX folks.  Implementing new functionality in close cooperation with stakeholders
Build well designed, clean applications with solid technical foundations
Participate in design and code reviews, develop, debug, or modify source code and unit tests
Create and maintain technical and support documentationWe are looking for you if you have:  1-3 years of Experience in Java Development
Good understanding of Object Oriented Programming concepts
Experience on web services, REST APIs , Databased like MySql , Postgres
Knowledge of design patterns and performance best practices.
Hands on experience with tools like intellji , Git and Postman.
English at B2 levelWhy you should join the SmartBear crew: You can grow your career at every level.
